The structure shown can be identified as a

choices.label: pyramid from Old Kingdom Egypt that served as a tomb for deceased rulers
pylon from New Kingdom Egypt that served as entrance to a sacred complex
Sumerian ziggurat that served as platform for a temple
Persian apadana that served as a royal audience hall

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 6.A: Attribute a work of art to a specific artist, culture, art historical style, or object type from the image set.
